entry.title: Payment Protocol: BIP 70, 71, 72
entry.summary: In a conversation between Andreas Schildbach and Jeff Garzik on September 25, 2013, Schildbach expressed his interest in implementing QR codes for payment requests once BIP70 is available. Garzik informed him that he could test this feature using Bitcoin-QT immediately. Garzik is a Senior Software Engineer and open source evangelist at BitPay Inc., a company that provides blockchain payment services.
